name: Putt Luck
description:
Made in 48 hours as my submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Classic mini golf with a twist - the ball is a dice 🎲. Each side has a different effect that may help or hinder you. 

Not as polished as I'd have liked it, but that's game jams for you. I'm still happy with it and I hope you like it too.

Update on the Web Build

I had no idea there was a section for adjusting screen size. Now it looks fine. Phew!

Assets

  • Mini Golf Kit by Kenny
  • Music and SFX from Freesound.org
